thread.title: UPDATE 1-IFS says wins order from Technogroup
thread.title_full: UPDATE 1-IFS says wins order from Technogroup | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: UPDATE 1-IFS says wins order from Technogroup
text:
(Adds contract value)
Sept 3 (Reuters) - Industrial And Financial Systems (IFS) AB
* Says IT service provider Technogroup replaces its existing solutions and aligns business processes with integrated enterprise software IFS Applications 9 from IFS
* The contract comprises licenses and services with a total value of over 1.2 million euros Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Stockholm Newsroom)
